about_the_game:
Zombie Wave

It is a delightful third person shooter game where players take on the role of a brave protector, tasked with surrounding and protecting cute cartoon characters from harm.
The characters and environment in the game are presented in a low polygon cartoon style, with rich colors and charming designs. Players will step into various incredible levels, including beautiful grasslands, mysterious forests and science fiction style cities.
You will face a constant influx of enemies who attempt to attack and harm cartoon characters around you. Players need to cleverly utilize various weapon types for defense and counterattacks. The game provides a variety of weapon options, including fast shooting pistols, powerful shotguns, precise sniper rifles, etc. You can freely choose to use according to different tactical needs.
In order to protect the safety of cartoon characters, players need to flexibly move and strategically deploy, and make reasonable use of terrain and obstacles to block enemy attacks Purchase the main body and send it to DLC
